data.name: Banzai Escape 2 Subterranean - Demon Hoodie
data.detailed_description:
This DLC includes a customisable Demon / Bat shape wing hoodie with changeable colours.

To use this item, go to inventory machine in the centre of the 1st floor.
data.about_the_game:
This DLC includes a customisable Demon / Bat shape wing hoodie with changeable colours.

To use this item, go to inventory machine in the centre of the 1st floor.
data.short_description: Includes a customisable Demon / Bat shape wing hoodie player outfit.

  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
